column1: Atkarsk (Russian: Атка́рск) is a town in Saratov Oblast
column3: located at the confluence of the Atkara and Medveditsa Rivers
column5: the administrative center of the oblast. Population: 25

column1: It was founded in place of a Tatar settlement at the mouth of the Atkara River. Town status was granted to it in 1781.
Within the framework of administrative divisions
column2: Atkarsk serves as the administrative center of Atkarsky District
column3: even though it is not a part of it. As an administrative division
column4: it is incorporated separately as Atkarsk Town Under Oblast Jurisdiction—an administrative unit with the status equal to that of the districts. As a municipal division
column5: Atkarsk Town Under Oblast Jurisdiction is incorporated within Atkarsky Municipal District as Atkarsk Urban Settlement.

column1: Russian pop singer Valeriya was born here in 1968.
